text: A second angel followed, saying, “14:8 Fallen ¦ Fallen, fallen Αν ANT BYZ CT PCK TRFallen is Babylon the 14:8 great ¦ great city TRgreat! 14:8 She 67.3% ¦ because she TR 15.1% ¦ she who ANT CT 12.7% [Note: The readings of ANT, CT, and TR would change the preceding exclamation point to a comma.]She has made all the nations drink of the wine of the wrath of her fornication.”
